title: The Lord of the Rings (1978 film)
summary: The Lord of the Rings is a 1978 American animated fantasy film directed by Ralph Bakshi.[6] It is an adaptation of J. R. R. Tolkien's high fantasy epic The Lord of the Rings, comprising The Fellowship of the Ring and some material from both books of The Two Towers. Set in Middle-earth, the film follows a group of hobbits, men, an elf, a dwarf and a wizard who form a fellowship. They embark on a quest to destroy the One Ring made by the Dark Lord Sauron; he has put much of his power into the Ring, and with it would control the whole of Middle-earth, but if it were destroyed, he would perish with it.
